com.github.daytron.revworks.service

Class NotificationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.daytron.revworks.service.QueryManagerAbstract
      • com.github.daytron.revworks.service.NotificationProvider

  • public class NotificationProvider
extends QueryManagerAbstract
    Wrapper class for all SQL user notification data retrievals.
    Author:
    Ryan Gilera

    • Method Detail

      • setListOfNotifications

        public void setListOfNotifications(CopyOnWriteArrayList<UserNotification> listOfNotifications)
        Saves all retrieved user notifications and count all unread notifications. Then call the event handler via AppEventBus to update the unread badge count in the user notification button.
        Parameters:
        listOfNotifications - CopyOnWriteArrayList object

      • getListOfNotifications

        public CopyOnWriteArrayList<UserNotification> getListOfNotifications()
        Access the current stored user notifications.
        Returns:
        CopyOnWriteArrayList object

      • isPause

        public boolean isPause()
        Determine the flag if the notification executor service is paused or not.
        Returns:
        true if paused, otherwise false

      • setPause

        public void setPause(boolean pause)
        Sets the pause flag for notification executor service.
        Parameters:
        pause - boolean value
